reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater dress fits beautifully, with one noting it hits right above the hips, and appreciate its flattering A-line style that looks great without knee-high boots. Moreover, the dress receives positive feedback for its quality, being perfect for winter weddings, and customers describe it as incredibly soft and not itchy at all. Additionally, they like its gorgeous black color and high-quality knit f

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic, flattering, not itchy, get it!
items.body: I almost didn’t get this dress. WOW! I am sooooooooo glad I did! This dress is flattering for anyone of any age with the classic lines and length. It does not itch or cling and it feels amazing on. The belt makes your waste seem smaller and there is no gap in the cross over in the chest area. The colors are beautiful that I got. I plan to wear it for holidays, but even for dinner out or work or an event. Maybe with a wrap or cardigan coat over it. Heels, mules or boots would work with this too. It will be my three season go to dress . Wish they made one like this in a Summer weight as it would be my go to for everyday. GET ONE AND TRY IT and then GET ONE IN EVERY COLOR!!!! I totally love this and feel like anyone of any size or age will look classic and amazing in it. It is elegant and soft and makes me feel beautiful and happy just trying it on. Honestly, I would run before they sell out! Runs TTS and not small like some reviews said in my opinion. This is THE MOST flattering sweater dress I have ever tried on. Most cling and show everything if you are not in perfect shape. This one is more than ideal! Hope you try one or two! Read more
items.author: Goody

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress for Anyone
items.body: If yiu like feeling confident, get the dress! Very cute and warm, especially with riding boots. I've only washed it twice pursuant to the included instructions, and it's washing well so far. I'm 4'11", 150 lbs that are mostly in my stomach and hips. I ordered the medium in green. I wear a camisole underneath for modesty at work, but that's because I am a 36DDD. Anyone else can probably go without the camisole and look amazing without risking exposure. I plan to order more colors. If anything tears up in the wash, I'll update. But for now, I highly recommend it! Read more
items.author: Alison R. Tiller

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: As soon as I opened the packages I could tell this dress had been returned. It was wadded up in a clear bag and had gray hairs all over it. That kind of grossed me out but not a big deal. I tried it on and it fits well. I’m usually a size large or like a 12/14 in pants and I ordered this dress in a large. It’s not the most flattering on my postpartum belly but the dress is beautiful. It looks just like the photos. I ordered the maroon color, and I’d suggest going for a dark color because the lighter colors are more see thru. I ordered the beige before and returned it. I also like that this is not too low cut at all but also breastfeeding friendly. Read more
items.author: R. Johnson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dress for nursing
items.body: I purchased this dress in the hopes that it could be used for nursing, and I absolutely love it. I had a lot of problems finding dresses that I liked the look of, that could also be used as a nursing dress but also have use after this and this dress fits the bill. What I love: The material is nice and soft and a bit thicker which is nice in colder months, and it makes the dress fall nicely. The material has some stretch to it, so you can pull down on the cut and nurse and the material does not seem to stretch out of place from this. I am tall (6 ft.) and this dress has a great length and the sleeves are long enough. I have been really happy with the dress, and I love the color (though that is a personal preference). Read more
items.author: Aurelia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: Love this sweater dress! It’s a great fit, although I’m super busty and wish it came up a smidge higher. I wear this dress to the office and plan to wear it for our holiday photos. TBH, I’m writing this review because Amazon said if I wrote one more, Rufus would tell me a joke. It is a great dress. But I also want to know what the joke is. Read more
items.author: ADK

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Well….I WANT to love it…
items.body: Pros—-cozy! Toasty, like a cozy house dress/robe, but prettier. Company could drop by and you would not be embarrassed. LONG sleeves for tall girls! NOT a wrap dress! So it can’t fall open…a HOT Momma from the waist up.. Plus it’s a NURSING DRESS!!! Whatttt!!!???? Cons—the skirt area flops downwards— it does not give an A-line shape at all. It’s body con to below the hip and then a slight flare outwards. A grandma vibe below the belt. Read more
items.author: SR

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress, good value
items.body: Beautiful! I got the rust color. (can’t remember the exact name (which is beautiful for autumn and the harvest season). Can’t wait for it to get cold enough for me to wear this. Wonderful fit: true to size. Can also be worn with a cinch waist belt, which is stunning. Great value for the price! And again very flattering. I have middle section areas that I like to keep hidden, and though this is somewhat fitted, I do not feel uncomfortable in it. Read more
items.author: Farideh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and work appropriate
items.body: Super soft, stretchy, and comfortable. Looks great for work too. I'm 5' 2" or 3" and it hits about mid calf which is what I expected based on their measurements. The material is medium thickness, not thin or see through but not super thick. Provided some warmth in the cold office I'm in without being too much. I wish they had more soft/dusty colors available! Read more
items.author: julie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Rust, Apricot, Black, Camel, Lake, Dustyblue, Oatmeal, Orange, Navy, Plum, Pink, Forestgreen, Cobaltblue, Darkviolet. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
